name: Michael Shields
description: I am a warmhearted, fun and easy to be with type of guy.. an optimist. I can be energetic..or just relaxing at home. Don’t sweat the small stuff, don’t take myself too seriously…like to laugh…have a good sense of humor and usually enjoying the moment. Enjoy NYC, travel, music, amusement parks, fairs and festivals, sports..have found that if you are with the right person anything can be enjoyable. Enjoy my career…I try to keep a good work-life balance.
